slide.title: More drawing
slide.blurb: A particularly useful 'fill' function is the %imagefilledarc()% function, which can be used to make pie charts

list.bullet: %IMG_ARC_PIE% - Fill as if it is a part of a pie chart
%IMG_ARC_CHORD% - Fill up to the chord of the arc
%IMG_ARC_NOFILL% - Currently only used with %IMG_ARC_EDGED% to indicate only the edges should be drawn (no real fill)
